Comment:
Didn't do much to this one. Some usual basic image improving procedures, and it's done. Haven't really read this one through, mainly because of the simple fact that I am no military operator. And I doubt I will ever be, at least not in a regular army.
But as the drums of war are beaten more loudly every day now, it seems, it feels worthwhile to let this one out too. If you know anyone currently in the military, let them know of this book, and (of course) tell them to spread it further. It's mainly directed to American soldiers, but any soldier might find this interesting.
